body.name: GEODMAER Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo with Phone Holder, Wrist Rest, Silent Rechargeable Backlit Full Size Ergonomic Keyboard and Mouse Wireless, Light Up Keyboard and Mouse for PC Mac
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
features: 【Backlit Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo】The Backlit keyboard and mouse combo with character translucency, which allows you to see every character clearly even in dim environments, the 2.4G wireless keyboard with three adjustable brightness levels, and the wireless mouse with breathing light effect and 7 colors/RGB Backlit.

【Phone Holder & Wrist Rest Wireless Keyboard】There is a device stand on top of the rechargeable wireless keyboard to hold your phone and tablet, which can help you video conference, read materials, watch videos, etc. while using your computer. The Ergonomic Keyboard with its own wrist rest is designed to give you a comfortable, healthy wrist angle while typing, maintaining comfort and wrist protection for long typing sessions.

【Ultra-Quiet Wireless Keyboard and Mouse】Benefit from the ultra-thin Wireless Keyboard's silent structural design, it can effectively reduce more than 95% of the knocking noise when tapping the keyboard. wireless mouse uses a silent mechanical micro-movement design to dramatically reduce the mouse's clicking sound without the annoying knocking sound, which will not disturb anyone.

【One USB Receiver Connect】The wireless keyboard and mouse combo requires only one USB receiver to connect 2 devices (the receiver is at the bottom of the wireless keyboard), the USB receiver is designed with dual heads and is compatible with both USB-A and Type-C interface types, 2.4G mature wireless connection technology, providing ultra-long 10 effective connection distance, efficient, stable wireless low latency connection.

【Rechargeable Wireless Keyboard and Mouse】Powerful battery life, wirelss keyboard and mouse can be charged via Type-C charging cable (included in the package), wireless keyboard can last up to 200H with the backlight off, and wirelss mouse can last up to 50H with the backlight off. Intelligent hibernation mode, when idle will automatically enter the hibernation mode, to protect the battery life and extend the use of time, hibernation mode can be reactivated by hitting any button.

【3 Years After-Sales Service】When you buy GEODMAER keyboard you get 3 years of after-sales service. During this period, if you encounter any quality problems, or if you have questions during use, just contact us and your problem will be solved within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The dual-head USB receiver design is compatible with both USB-A and Type-C ports, and only one USB receiver is needed to connect the keyboard and mouse at the same time. No need AA Batteries, Charge by Type-C charging cable and require only one charge for 200H continuous use for the keyboard (without backlit) and 500H continuous use for the mouse（without backlit)

With 17 multimedia function buttons, you can use multiple functions easily and conveniently, so you can work more efficiently. More Detailed Indicators Clear and unambiguous indicators, no fuzzy guesses. wireless keyboard is compatible with Win and Mac systems, switch the keyboard to the corresponding system according to the actual use. Automatically enters hibernation mode at idle, effective in extending the use time and battery life, and can be quickly activated with the click of any button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED: looks and feels lovely
reviews.reviewText: Love the look and feel of the keys! The mouse is smooth and quiet. Colors are beautiful.The seller has exceptional customer service. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works and preforms as it should. It’s super quiet and works well with my Mac

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery Life of Keyboard is awful
reviews.reviewText: Pros:I love how quiet and soft the keys are.I like the backlight of the keys (wish they were animated though)Cons:The battery life is awful. I charged the keyboard over the entire weekend. Came in on Monday to work my 8 hr day, worked fine. Turned off the keyboard prior to leaving. Came in the next morning and the keyboard was dead. Have to plug in and charge each night. Ugh.UPDATE 10/27/23: Keys are glitchy, even when keeping plugged in 24/7. Sometimes non-responsive, other times TOO responsive and types multiples of the key pressed only once. Looking for a different keyboard now - too late to return so I though I would warn everyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Wow, for the price, I can't believe it.It is super nice and looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the keyboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's an OK keyboar that could be great
reviews.reviewText: I love the look, sound and feel of this keyboard but the keys are already wearing off after only a couple of months. I can't imaging what it's going to look like after a year. If it wasn't for that, I would totally love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Battery life on the keyboard isn’t super long, but I love that both the mouse and keyboard are rechargeable so I’m not blowing through batteries. I have the little charging cord plugged into the surge protector on my desk so I can easily plug them in when needed. They can still be used while plugged in and charging, which is nice, because I use these for work. The mouse seems to last a little longer, even though I use it way more than the keyboard. But so far, other than the battery life, I really like these! The mouse is really slim which took me some time to get used to, but it’s very responsive and has an auto-sleep feature when it’s idle for a few minutes, and you just have to click to wake it up. The only thing I don’t love is the “WIN” and “MAC” buttons being literally right above the 10-key pad. I type by touch and rarely actually look at the keyboard so I have accidentally hit the “MAC” button a couple times and disabled my keyboard function in the middle of working. Kind of inconvenient, wish the placement of those buttons was a little different, but other than that I really love both pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is very vibrant; however, after two weeks of use it stopped working. Also, the keys are to flat for me and I spend a lot of time on the computer.
